files.README.md:
Claude Plugins Marketplace

Plugin marketplace for Claude Code

--- ## About A curated collection of Claude Code plugins for Laravel, Nuxt, and structured technical workflows. ## Installation Add this marketplace to Claude Code: ``` /plugin marketplace add leeovery/claude-plugins-marketplace ``` Then browse and install plugins: ``` /plugin menu ``` ## Available Plugins | Plugin | Description | |--------|-------------| | [claude-technical-workflows](https://github.com/leeovery/claude-technical-workflows) | Six-phase workflow: research, discuss, specify, plan, implement, review | | [claude-laravel](https://github.com/leeovery/claude-laravel) | Opinionated Laravel development patterns and practices | | [claude-nuxt](https://github.com/leeovery/claude-nuxt) | Opinionated Nuxt 4 + Vue 3 development patterns | ## Alternative: npm Installation These plugins are also available via npm, which copies skills directly to your project's `.claude/` directory (useful for Claude Code on the web): ```bash npm install -D @leeovery/claude-technical-workflows npm install -D @leeovery/claude-laravel npm install -D @leeovery/claude-nuxt ``` See [@leeovery/claude-manager](https://github.com/leeovery/claude-manager) for details. ## License MIT License. See [LICENSE](LICENSE) for details. ---

Built by Lee Overy
